Home > external > combineMetaCycKEGGModels.m

combineMetaCycKEGGModels

PURPOSE

combineMetaCycKEGGModels

SYNOPSIS

function model=combineMetaCycKEGGModels(metacycModel,keggModel)

DESCRIPTION 

 combineMetaCycKEGGModels
    Combine MetaCyc and KEGG draft models into one model structure.

    Input:
    metacycModel    the reconstructed model from MetaCyc
    keggModel       the reconstructed model from KEGG

    Output:
    model           a model structure generated by integrating information
                   from draft models reconstructed using MetaCyc and KEGG
                   databases. The 'rxnFrom/metFrom/geneFrom' fields are
                   included to indicate the source.

    Usage: model=combineMetaCycKEGGModels(metacycModel,keggModel)

    Hao Wang, 2019-10-21

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
This function is called by:

0001 function model=combineMetaCycKEGGModels(metacycModel,keggModel)
0002 % combineMetaCycKEGGModels
0003 %    Combine MetaCyc and KEGG draft models into one model structure.
0004 %
0005 %    Input:
0006 %    metacycModel    the reconstructed model from MetaCyc
0007 %    keggModel       the reconstructed model from KEGG
0008 %
0009 %    Output:
0010 %    model           a model structure generated by integrating information
0011 %                   from draft models reconstructed using MetaCyc and KEGG
0012 %                   databases. The 'rxnFrom/metFrom/geneFrom' fields are
0013 %                   included to indicate the source.
0014 %
0015 %    Usage: model=combineMetaCycKEGGModels(metacycModel,keggModel)
0016 %
0017 %    Hao Wang, 2019-10-21

0020 %Just return the model
0021 if nargin<2
0022     disp('Missing input model');
0023     return;
0024 end
0025 
0026 %Add MetaCyc model as template
0027 model=metacycModel;
0028 model.id='COMBINED';
0029 model.description='Combined model from MetaCyc and KEGG draft models';
0030 
0031 %Use MetaCyc model as template
0032 model.rxnFrom=cell(numel(model.rxns),1);
0033 model.rxnFrom(:)={'MetaCyc'};
0034 model.metFrom=cell(numel(model.mets),1);
0035 model.metFrom(:)={'MetaCyc'};
0036 model.geneFrom=cell(numel(model.genes),1);
0037 model.geneFrom(:)={'MetaCyc'};
0038 model.grRulesKEGG=cell(numel(model.rxns),1);
0039 model.grRulesKEGG(:)={''};
0040 
0041 %Remove the S and rxnGeneMat matrix
0042 if isfield(model,'S')
0043     model=rmfield(model,'S');
0044 end
0045 if isfield(model,'rxnGeneMat')
0046     model=rmfield(model,'rxnGeneMat');
0047 end
0048 
0049 %Arrange the genes related fields
0050 
0051 %Identify the shared genes between KEGG and MetaCyc
0052 sharedGenes=intersect(keggModel.genes,model.genes);
0053 [~, b]=ismember(sharedGenes,model.genes);
0054 model.geneFrom(b)={'Both'};
0055 
0056 %Add unique genes from KEGG and update geneFrom
0057 C=setdiff(keggModel.genes,model.genes);
0058 model.genes=[model.genes;C];
0059 geneFrom=cell(numel(C),1);
0060 geneFrom(:)={'KEGG'};
0061 model.geneFrom=[model.geneFrom;geneFrom];
0062 
0063 %Prepare for matching grRules
0064 if isfield(keggModel,'grRules')
0065     keggModel.grRules=strrep(keggModel.grRules,'(','');
0066     keggModel.grRules=strrep(keggModel.grRules,')','');
0067 end
0068 
0069 %Replace rxns in KEGG model with the corresponding ones in MetaCyc by
0070 %updating values rxns field to MetaCyc version whenever possible
0071 
0072 %Collect the ones found in MetaCyc as mappedRxns
0073 mappedRxns=[];
0074 rxnsToMove=[];
0075 grRulesToMove={}; %Storing the grRules to be moved to MetaCyc model
0076 
0077 %Read in dbLinks, note that linkMetaCycKEGGRxns need to be run in advance
0078 load('metaCycRxns.mat');
0079 num=0;
0080 numToMove=0;
0081 %Loop through the KEGG model and replace the rxn id from KEGG to MetaCyc
0082 %version
0083 for i=1:numel(keggModel.rxns)
0084     [~, b]=ismember(rxnLinks.kegg,keggModel.rxns{i});
0085     I=find(b);
0086     
0087     if numel(I)==1
0088         %Find out the corresponding MetaCyc reactions
0089         num=num+1;
0090         %Record the mapped rxn index in KEGG model and remove them later
0091         mappedRxns=[mappedRxns,i];
0092         %keggModel.rxns{i}=rxnLinks.metacyc{I(1)};
0093         
0094         [c, d]=ismember(rxnLinks.metacyc{I(1)},model.rxns);
0095         if c
0096             model.rxnFrom{d}='Both';
0097             %Combine the grRule info Check if KEGG grRules equals or a
0098             %subset of MetaCyc grRules If not, save the KEGG grRules to a
0099             %new field grRulesKEGG for manual curation
0100             k=strfind(model.grRules{d},keggModel.grRules{i});
0101             if isempty(k)
0102                 if isempty(model.grRulesKEGG{d})
0103                     model.grRulesKEGG{d}=keggModel.grRules{i};
0104                 else
0105                     model.grRulesKEGG{d}=strcat(model.grRulesKEGG{d},{' or '},keggModel.grRules{i});
0106                 end
0107             end
0108         else
0109             %For the KEGG rxns have MetaCyc version but not in MetaCyc
0110             %draft model
0111             [~, y]=ismember(rxnLinks.metacyc{I(1)},metaCycRxns.rxns);
0112             
0113             %Check if this reaction is repitetive and save the grRules
0114             [Repeat, Index]=ismember(y,rxnsToMove);
0115             if ~Repeat
0116                 rxnsToMove=[rxnsToMove;y];  %Record rxns to be moved from KEGG to MetaCyc model
0117                 if isempty(keggModel.grRules{i})
0118                     %Rxns may have empty grRules (e.g. spontaneous) that
0119                     %are identified and added back here
0120                     grRulesToMove=[grRulesToMove;{''}];
0121                 else
0122                     grRulesToMove=[grRulesToMove;keggModel.grRules{i}];
0123                 end
0124                 numToMove=numToMove+1;
0125             else
0126                 %If this reaction has been recorded, append the grRules if
0127                 %it is different
0128                 k=strfind(grRulesToMove{Index},keggModel.grRules{i});
0129                 if isempty(k)
0130                     grRulesToMove{Index}=strcat(grRulesToMove{Index},{' or '},keggModel.grRules{i});
0131                 end
0132             end
0133         end
0134     else
0135         %Here are the case of one KEGG rxn id link to several MetaCyc ids
0136         %for j=2:numel(I) Ignore this issue for now, and resolve it later,
0137         %because it never happened This case can be solved by adding above
0138         %section into a loop below disp(I(j)); end
0139     end
0140 end
0141 fprintf('NOTE: A total of %d reactions in the KEGG model were mapped to MetaCyc.\n',num);
0142 fprintf('NOTE: %d reactions already in MetaCyc model, %d will be combined.\n',num-numToMove,numToMove);
0143 
0144 %Append mapped MetaCyc rxns in KEGG model that are absent from MetaCyc
0145 %model
0146 rxnFrom=cell(numel(rxnsToMove),1);
0147 rxnFrom(:)={'KEGG'};
0148 model.rxnFrom=[model.rxnFrom;rxnFrom];
0149 model.rxns=[model.rxns;metaCycRxns.rxns(rxnsToMove)];
0150 
0151 rxnNames=metaCycRxns.rxnNames(rxnsToMove);
0152 %Replace rxnNames with those from metaCycEnzymes
0153 load('metaCycEnzymes.mat');
0154 for i=1:numel(rxnsToMove)
0155     [a, b]=ismember(metaCycRxns.rxns{rxnsToMove(i)},metaCycEnzymes.rxns);
0156     if a
0157         rxnNames{i}=metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames{b};
0158     end
0159 end

0179 %Remove all mapped reactions from KEGG model
0180 pureKeggModel=removeReactions(keggModel,mappedRxns,true,true);

0194     [a, b]=ismember(pureKeggModel.mets{i},metaCycMets.keggid);
0195     if a
0196         %For now only replace the met ids
0197         num=num+1;
0198         pureKeggModel.mets{i}=metaCycMets.mets{b};
0199         %Record the replaced mets into a vector for later
0200     end
0201 end
0202 fprintf('NOTE: A total of %d metabolites from the global KEGG model will be re-mapped to MetaCyc.\n',num);
0203

0205 equationStrings=constructEquations(pureKeggModel,'',false,false,false,true);

0277     [a, b]=ismember(model.mets{i},metaCycMets.mets);

0289         if c
